name: Volt
description: Volt is a classic oscilloscope-themed robot who is a proud member of the WebtrES club. With its cat-shaped box and soldier-like buttons, Volt combines the charm of feline elegance with the strength and discipline of a soldier. Its arms and legs are designed in the image of a soldier, giving it exceptional dexterity and strength. The screen of Volt is a classic display, reminiscent of the old-school oscilloscopes. This unique combination of traits makes Volt a beloved member of the WebtrES club.
